taxonomicnotes: The genus Trichopodus was recently considered valid from popular synonym Trichogaster. Its previous family; Belontiidae was merged into Osphronemidae based on phylogenetic research undertaken by R. Britz (pers. comm. 2011).
rationale: This species is abundant to common throughout the majority of its range and is assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Kullander, S.O., Ng, H.H., Baird, I., Rainboth, W. & Allen, D.
